headline: Regeneron Announces Investor Conference Presentations
summary: TARRYTOWN, N.Y., April 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: REGN) will webcast management participation as follows: BofA Securities 2025 Health Care Conference at 10:00 a.m. PT (1:00 p.m. ET) on Tuesday, May 13, 20252025 RBC Capital Markets Global Healthcare Conference at 11:00 a.m. ET on Tuesday, May 20, 2025Bernstein 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference at 11:00 a.m. ET on Wednesday, May 28, 2025Goldman Sachs 46th Annual Global Healthcare Conference at 10

headline: Sanofi & Regeneron's Dupixent Receives FDA Nod for Urticaria
summary: The FDA approves SNY and REGN's Dupixent for treating chronic spontaneous urticaria, marking the seventh approved indication of the drug.

raw.headline: Sanofi & Regeneron's Dupixent Receives FDA Nod for Urticaria
raw.summary: The FDA approves SNY and REGN's Dupixent for treating chronic spontaneous urticaria, marking the seventh approved indication of the drug.

headline: Sanofi and Regeneron’s dupilumab approved by FDA for urticaria
summary: The decision is supported by data from the Phase III Study A and Study C clinical trials.
